page.title: 12RELIGION AROUND KIRKSTEAD
page.content: {RELIGION AROUND KIRKSTEAD & W. SPA The {Roman Catholic}Church of our Lady & St.Peter is one of four covered by a priest.It has a small catchment area,is small,but has a strong cause. The{Unitarians}are a small group meeting monthly with a visiting preacher from Lincoln. The{Evangelical Pentecostal}Church meet in the Scout hut.They are part of the outreach of the fastest growing church in the county.The Newlife Christian Fellowship,Newlands,Lincoln. About 30 per evening service, average age 25/30.{House Fellowship:}There are several interdenominational groups which meet each week in private houses for prayer and Bible studies.The members of all churches are very active in local affairs. Local schools have Christian assembly & R.E.is part of the school curriculum.
